ygData.msgSnippet: A new level is available for registered users at http://plaza.v-wave.com/moontug/rebels.zip This map is called the Northlands Rebellion.  It is *not* a map

From: "crayner" <crayner@...>

A new level is available for registered users at

http://plaza.v-wave.com/moontug/rebels.zip

This map is called the "Northlands Rebellion."  It is *not* a map for a
super-advanced group.  It is a map for a new team that consists of
*one* player.

Begin a new game, hire *one* person on to your team of any type you
like (your favourite character class, for example), set your level to 120
and try it out.

Feedback is welcome!  I might write sequels to this plot.

-Chris/Shayd
